website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and durable mat that can be used on a wide range of surfaces, from the gym to the pool.
pros: Constructed from a 0.9mm thick drop-stitch material
Measures 10 feet by 3.3 feet by 4 inches
Works well on a variety of surfaces, from the gym and backyard to the beach...even on water
Comes with an electric pump, carry bag, and a repair kit
cons: Reports of some of these arriving missing parts, such as the repair kit
Some say that this mat is too hard and doesn't offer enough bounce

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This airtrack is PERFECT for my 8 year old daughter who is a gymnast! She loves using it to train at home and I feel a lot better about her tumbling on these instead of just her regular mats! We bought her 2 so she has plenty of space and can connect multiple skills! These are also the cheapest we have found after doing a bunch of research! She loves using these in the pool as well! Their customer service is A++ they answer every question and help every step of the way! Don't waste your money on a more expensive brand! Buy Ibigbean you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Works great but seems to not hold air for more than 24 hrs
customer_reviews.text: Hi, got this for my 11 y.o. daughter and she loves it. Only question/concern is that it doesn't keep the air for more than 24 hrs and needs to have air added. Works adequately for the session but by the next day needs air. It has always been like this - and no noticeable holes/tears. Is this normal? That said, she loves it. It was expensive! and it large and a pain to store but works really well. To be clear, it doesn't lose ALL the air, but it definitely needs to have air added.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Gymnast reborn again!
customer_reviews.text: The airtack is great! So impressed with the outcome. Great quality heavy duty and ready for some tumbling! I have never seen a little girl so happy until she opened this mat!
customer_reviews.author: Buckland2be

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tumbling
customer_reviews.text: We have had this air track for 4 months now. It is awesome. My daughter uses it daily. I only have to add air one or twice a month. It is strong and durable. Easy to set up and take down. I wish my house allowed for one that was longer but the 13’ is all that would fit. I would suggest getting the longest one your space will allow.
customer_reviews.author: MMH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. Very responsive and helpful. My 12 year old daughter loves her mat. It is sturdy and has just the right amount of bounce. Her friends love it, too, and some are planning on getting their own. I would advise getting at least the 16' if your child wants to do more than one flip at a time. I don't have any problems with air leakage. The 16' comes with a powerful electric inflator pump that fills the mat very quickly (note the 10' comes with a manual pump). Highly recommended if you have a gymnast in your family!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very tough, firmer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality inflated mat. I wasn't expecting it to be as firm as it is when inflated. It's very nearly as firm as a standard gym mat. I didn't give it 5 stars because the price is so high. But, if this lasts the rest of my life, like it seems it will, it's a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: slayerfan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product nearly a year ago. It was fine for about 10 months. We only had to top the air up occasionally. A couple of months ago the valve failed. We can't pump fast enough to overcome the speed at which the air is exiting the valve. Once the cap is replaced air continues to leak. This is a replacement for another brand which only lasted 3 weeks before the valve failed. I'm hoping iBigBean is able to help us.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Booth

customer_reviews.title: Great product and it got here quickly
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! It was about $200 less expensive than the one she asked for and this one comes with a carry bag and the pump! Great product and it got here quickly! I would 100% recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: She is a gymnast but even friends that are not enjoy bouncing and tumbling on this mat
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this for Christmas present and is the envy of all the girls in the neighborhood. She is a gymnast but even friends that are not enjoy bouncing and tumbling on this mat. I find her 11 year old brother bouncing on it during breaks from his video games too! Super great construction. Ibigbean has excellent customer service as well. We originally ordered the wrong product and they were quick to respond to my Amazon Message inquiry to immediately resolve the situation. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Tara McDade

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. My daughter uses it to work on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. My daughter uses it to work on back handsprings, tucks, & punch-fronts and loves it. Not quite long enough to connect a roundoff back handspring. This mat is also lots of fun in the pool! It would be beneficial to have instructions on how to fill it up without losing air when you let go to plug it because we did figure out that there's a trick!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the block
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter just had to have thia air block to add to her air track. I questioned it but it is quite amazing how much she uses it with and without the airtrack. I am also suprised that this has not popped considering how hard she is on it but it seems really well made. If your child loves tumbling then this is a good investmwnt.
customer_reviews.author: Shane C.

customer_reviews.title: She LOVES these Mats!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd purchase! The Mats are great and durable and customer service is very good. We had a problem with our pump and the sent a new one right away.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Great track - worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and exactly what we were looking for. Great addition to my granddaughter’s home gym! Just what she needed to work on her tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Lana J Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Did not arrive in great shape.
customer_reviews.text: This came pretty banged up and had black smudges and scrapes on it. It Probably won’t let long which is disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gym mom
customer_reviews.text: My gymnast loves this air board. It’s been used almost daily for 6 months in a home with pets and is holding up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bloch

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves to flip and tumble on this! Inflated fast and easy to roll back up
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Love this air track. It’s made very well and it’s perfect for any tumbler.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with her air track. If you plan on doing a lot of running tumbling I would recommend 16 feet or more. This product is really made well and customer service was excellent. We had a few problems on the shipping but customer service took care of it quickly and overnighted it just to help my daughter get it on her birthday. Very happy with ibigbean Company.
customer_reviews.author: Laura ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing at home inside and out
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is 16 and 132 lbs, 5ft 6 and its perfect for her to practice on! very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: suzanne w.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Bounce
customer_reviews.text: We set up our ibigbean air floor yesterday, and our gymnasts have been enjoying it immensely. The set up is pretty easy; it just takes a little "elbow grease" to inflate the air floor with the enclosed pump. The floor is just as bouncy as the Air Track brand, and the quality seems comparable too. We are very pleased so far! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Schwamb

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbling mat
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The mat stays inflated for days. My girls love tumbling on it.
customer_reviews.author: MRW

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really good product! Great for doing back ticks and tricks if of off it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality at a good price My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Heavy Kevy

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: This item is defective. It only stays inflated for about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Avid amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Already not working after 1 mo.
customer_reviews.text: We are so disappointed. Loved this but it stopped holding air. Can someone from customer service please reach out? This was expensive and we got 1 month of use.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This airtrak is great!!!!! It is bouncy and I already learned new tricks on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this mat! It was exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My daughter is a gymnast and needed to practice at home. Great product for this. She uses it everyday and it holds up very well. Love that it has Velcro on the ends to extend the length. We may buy another in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, my daughter is very happy with this, exactly what she had imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: It's really great for my gymnastics, and I've gotten so many skills on it. I'm planning to buy another one from this brand to make it longer
customer_reviews.author: Hongbin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only used indoors so far and they seem to like it!! Seems of excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great size, easy to get started and very light .
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My daughter is a tumbler and though she has a 26.5 foot air track , this was a perfect addition for standing skills which forces her to land in a smaller area. And it is a perfect extension to her other track.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa T.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Leaks air around the fill valve. Zeo on customer assistance the air track company has not returned any of my emails. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: andy  fileder

customer_reviews.title: Broken air pump
customer_reviews.text: Broken pump the moment we opened it. Used an air vac to pump it and the mat seems to be okay but very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: kelly berglund

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars!!! My 11 year old daughter loves it she stays on it all day long!!! It very easy to set up. Awesome product and company!!
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great for tumbling enthusiasts!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 yr old daughter who wanted something to practice back handsprings on. She loves it!! Easy to inflate and seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Heather M Whiteford

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun and exercise
customer_reviews.text: The Air Track Tumbling Mat is a hit with the kids. I am glad we chose the 20 foot length. Long enough to to do several tricks in one pass.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D. Baseley

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Ibigbean customer service was excellent. Item arrived with a leak and ibigbean resolved the problem immediately/
customer_reviews.author: James Lay

customer_reviews.title: Air floor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mat for my all star cheerleaders. Highly recommend. Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Really Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Really Love this!!!! and you can have it outdoors as well. Great for kids also sleeping on as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Very quality product, my daughter uses it daily! Easy to inflate, easy to put away.
customer_reviews.author: charmed88

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters liked it. So far, it is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Durable and easy to set up. Only issue has been that my gauge on the pump does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: so bouncy, very durable. had this for 5 months now. worth the money
customer_reviews.author: jeannine v.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this air block. She issues it all the time and we have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mat you will find and it is so easy to pump up
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wool

customer_reviews.title: love the mat
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is 11 years old, loves the mat i would buy two if i have more space. no problems at all, very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s built tough 👍
customer_reviews.text: This was a great experience - good Comms, speedy delivery half way around the world and an excellent product !
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: if not better!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality for the price. As described, if not better!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but good
customer_reviews.text: Over priced but otherwise a great product. My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home practice
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Perfect for at home practice. Mine did not come with repair kit though. How can I get that?
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy S

customer_reviews.title: do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product is not what a typical air track should be. It's hard and has no bounce. It's crap and not worth the money . do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: ibigbean Air Tumble Track Training Mats Home Use Series
feature_bullets: Home Gym Set Including: Air floor-10'x.3.3'x4''(1pc),Air board-3.3'x2'x4''(1pc),Air block-3.3'x2'x8''(1pc),Air roller-24''D(1pc),Make your gym home easier and Professional

Durable Material: Our air gym is made of Double-Wall Material (also know as drop stitch material), and 0.9mm thickness durable commercial grade PVC tarpaulin. Better airtightness and durability since reinforcement are made for all seams.
Easy Inflate/Deflate: Only takes several minutes to inflate or deflate the home gym. After inflation, the Air tumbling will maintain its pressure for days.

WIDE APPLICATION: The Air Floor can be placed on the gym floor, the artistic gymnastics floor, in high-performance training, gymnastic exercises, dance clubs, fitness clubs, schools, leisure centers,home entertainment, gymnasium, dance club, professional training, park or rental business. Also, it could be used on backyard, grass land, beach or water. Just make sure there is no sharp things or fire around.
Gymnasts from beginner to advanced will benefit from the inflatable gymnastic tumbling mat
